Dear all.
We have just started using the group-max-success-kb 
in the Quota=
Enforcer available with heritrix 1.6.0.

If we set the limit to X bytes, an=
d get less than X bytes for a
certain domain, can be we sure, that we have =
finished harvesting this
domain?

We have some logic that uses the data in =
the heritrix-host-report
to decide, if we now have finished harvesting a do=
main, or
we still need to harvest some more from this domain.

The logic no=
w goes:

if (bytesReceivedFromDomain >=3D maxBytesPerDomain) {
       // st=
ill needs to harvest more from this domain
       ...
} else {
       // Fi=
nished harvesting this domain
       ..
}


After testing, we can see that =
the if-clause:
  bytesReceivedFromDomain >=3D maxBytesPerDomain
is not alwa=
ys correct.
Sometimes the bytesReceived is a little less than MaxBytesPerDo=
main,
when byte-limit has been reached.


Have anyone got any suggestions t=
o make this logic work?
